dcterms:description: BRATS-2015 training dataset comprises of 220 subjects with high grade gliomas and 54 subjects with low grade gliomas. The size of each MRI image is 155 × 240 × 240. The label image contains five labels: non-tumor, necrosis, edema, non-enhancing tumor and enhancing tumor.
dcterms:title: BRATS-2015

dcterms:creator: G. J. Brostow
J. Shotton
J. Fauqueur
R. Cipolla
dcterms:description: CamVid dataset is captured from the perspective of a driving automobile with fixed-position CCTV-style cameras. It provides videos with object class semantic labels, associating each pixel with one of 32 semantic classes.
dcterms:title: CamVid
